column1: The neighbouring kingdom has been weakened. Invade the neighbouring kingdom?
Your military wishes to conduct a hunt in the woods. Join them?
Your enemies want to sign a peace treaty to prevent war. Sign the treaty?
The church wants to start a war with the pagans, let them?
Sire, our men grow restless. Shall we turn their water into wine?
The church is lacking manpower. Recruit more church officials from the people?
The church would like to build schools for the people. Allow them?
A few monks have been found behaving like ducks in the square, lock them up?
The pope requests to declare 25th December a new holiday, Christ Mass. Agree?
Is the earth round?
The people are losing faith in the church. Establish more churches?
The priests requires more funds to maintain their lifestyle. Donate?
Your advisors recommend you invest in gold instead of the church. Invest?
The church wants to impose mandatory donations, yay or nay?
We must increase our military might. Enlist children?
We need more soldiers. Recruit the women?
Your general has been challenged to a duel. Allow him to take up the duel?
Your soldiers have been found raping women. Execute them?
A great peace falls over the kingdom. Abolish conscription?
The neighbouring king is visiting. Organize a grand feast?
Our weaponry is outdated. Invest in spoons to make our weapons stronger?
There has not been a war in ages. Give a rallying speech to the military?
Your fortress is weak. Build another tower?
Your allied nations require your military support. Assist them?
There has been a bad harvest this season. Decrease taxes
The people feel that the price of bread is too high. Lower the price?
The streets smell like sewage. Clear the sewage system?
It's your kingdom's anniversary. Hold a feast to celebrate?
Your Kingdom finances are low. Start a pyramid scheme?
The priests would like to hold a mass prayer. Allow them to proceed?
The priest defecated on your doorstep. Start a cult?
The general wants to demonstrate his men?s prowess. Accept?
The general wants to you to inspect his cannons. Wear gloves?
Beggars are invading the streets. Throw them out?
A hungry boy was caught stealing your crown jewels. Bring him to the priest?
Kingdoms from the orient would like to sign a trade pact. Sign the treaty?
Your northern neighbours want you to pay for their border wall. Si?
The head priest has become too old and has retired, the church is unstable.
The people are happy and you are loved by them.
A meteor destroyed the neighbouring city!
The previous King took a loan and now the debt must be repaid.
The kingdoms in the orient have seized your carriages/trebuchets.
The neighbouring prince wants to marry your daughter. Marry her off?
Relations with the neighbouring kingdom are deteriorating. Send gifts?
A crow has been sitting on your porch every morning. Increase patrols?
You hear your younger brother is eyeing your throne. Send into exile?
The devil would like to make a deal with you.
Dijkstra the Short was caught trespassing. Your remove him from your stack.
The great prophet Kurniawan smiles upon you.
Advisor Zhang hands you his scrolls of wisdom.
